rows.label: qev018401_MSG0001
rows.name:
Tell me, friend, do you not think Kirsty is a simply
marvelous woman?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018401_MSG0002
rows.name:
A crack operations manager, yet with a true scholar's
knowledge of FrontierNav![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018401_MSG0003
rows.name:
She grasped both the nature and potential of my battle
probes almost instantly.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018401_MSG0004
rows.name:
She even offered to personally recommend them to
some industry connections. Isn't she wonderful?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018401_JNK0010
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: qev018401_SEL0011
rows.name: Tell Hugo that you also think Kirsty is the bee's knees.

rows.label: qev018401_JNK0020
rows.name: Disagree

rows.label: qev018401_SEL0021
rows.name: Suspect that Kirsty has an ulterior motive.

rows.label: qev018401_MSG0005
rows.name:
I'm so glad you agree. Keen judgment, that's what
she's got! Keen judgment all around.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018401_MSG0006
rows.name: I can see why she's so popular among the Pathfinders.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018401_MSG0007
rows.name:
I fully understand your doubts. I myself was a big ball
of paranoia until just recently.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018401_MSG0008
rows.name:
I was convinced my battle probes were being shut out
as part of a vast industry conspiracy.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018401_MSG0009
rows.name:
I hope you can be taught to trust again someday.
Perhaps by a figure like Kirsty? Mmm?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018401_MSG0010
rows.name:
Putting that aside, let's get back to business.
You're eager for my next series of battle probes,
no doubt.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018401_MSG0011
rows.name:
Next, I think I'll craft you ones that reduce your
opponents' resistances to debuffs. I'm thinking
of calling them "EZ debuff probes."[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018401_MSG0012
rows.name:
I think... No, I'm SURE that 30,000 units of miranium
will be enough. You'll provide it, of course?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018401_MSG0013
rows.name:
You and she are very much alike, you know?
You have the eye to see what really matters.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018401_MSG0014
rows.name:
Bring me that miranium, and I will bring all my
expertise to bear in crafting you an exceptional
new series of battle probes.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018401_MSG0015
rows.name: Being needed by others feels really good.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018401_MSG0016
rows.name:
Until just recently, I was working on these battle probes
out of spite. So I could prove all my doubters wrong.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018401_MSG0017
rows.name:
But now I really just want to be useful. To help people.
Keep them safe. My whole outlook's brightened up![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018401_MSG0018
rows.name:
I'll be here waiting for that miranium.
Bring it, and I'll have the first in my series of
EZ debuff probes ready for you in no time.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018401_MSG0019
rows.name:
Hmm... That issue on the third spec sheet is still in
the way...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018401_MSG0020
rows.name:
Oh, hey there. Sorry about that.
You have that miranium I was asking about?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018401_JNK0030
rows.name: Deliver

rows.label: qev018401_SEL0031
rows.name: Hand over 30,000 units of miranium.

rows.label: qev018401_JNK0040
rows.name: Keep

rows.label: qev018401_SEL0041
rows.name: Hold on to your miranium for now.

rows.label: qev018401_MSG0021
rows.name:
Mmm, that's some top-quality stuff. Now I just need to
resolve one last design problem, and she's ready to go.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018401_MSG0022
rows.name:
If you don't mind waiting, I'll go see what advice
Kirsty might have to offer.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018401_MSG0023
rows.name:
She's a FrontierNav specialist and generally brilliant,
so she may have the perfect solution.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018401_MSG0024
rows.name: Got it! It's finally done![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018401_MSG0025
rows.name: Here it isâ€”the EZ debuff probe![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018401_MSG0026
rows.name:
Install one of these at a FrontierNav probe site,
and any enemies in that region will have their
resistance to debuffs reduced.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018401_MSG0027
rows.name:
Here. The first one in this new series is yours.
Now put it to use keeping the city safe![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018401_MSG0028
rows.name:
Oh, and not sure if I mentioned it, but I got the chance
to demo my battle probes to some of the arms industry
higher-ups.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018401_MSG0029
rows.name:
All thanks to the good word Kirsty put in for me.
I won't let this opportunity go to waste.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018401_MSG0030
rows.name:
Now that I've got an in, I'm going to redouble my
efforts and tackle bigger projects than ever![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018401_MSG0031
rows.name:
Oh? Well, all right. While you're looking for more,
I'll keep working here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev018401_MSG0032
rows.name: I'll find a fix for this design problem yet...[ST:wait ]
